home.parrafo-info: Student of different branches of computer science, taking as a starting point the design of both cloud and structures. I specialise in different areas, which has given me a broad and versatile profile in the field.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a highly responsible, punctual and organised person, with a great ability to adapt to different working environments. My goal is to get my first job opportunity in the IT sector, where I am confident that my skills and knowledge can make a difference.
I feel ready to face new challenges and contribute effectively.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: You will embark on an epic battle, far from being the conventional game and with plenty of twists and turns
proyectos.info-proyecto2: We provide a tutorial and an example of how to deploy a website using amazon S3.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
